column2:
"I can't deal with those Mechs...
No matter how hard I focus, I can't catch their tells. They're too robotic."
"Then they call their friends in and start blowing themselves up! It's more than I can take. Seriously."

"I bet even you would have a hard time with this one.
Huh? You don't think so?"
"Then show me what I gotta do! I need some serious guidance here!"
